official_title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 500 Pearl Street in New York City, New York, as the "Ted Weiss United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located at 500 Pearl Street in New York City, New York, as the Ted Weiss United States Courthouse.
